attributes.action: Recognise Mary Whitehouse as a national Figure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mary Whitehouse was a woman who went on a mission to clean up TV in perticular the BBC. This petition calls on the Prime Minister to recognise Mary Whitehouse as a national figure.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
